name: Senior Python Backend Developer (to Cyprus)
description:
FaceApp is a global innovator in portrait perfection - blending advanced neural network technology with ease of use.

Our team has leading expertise in machine learning and mobile interfaces, and our goal is to make mobile photography and video readily accessible to all mobile users beyond those with artistic professional skills. Our mission is to create the best yet easy-to-use selfie and portrait editor. Our workplace is a creative environment for developing high-quality products. We are looking for like-minded people who are ready to join our friendly and passionate team in Limassol (Cyprus).

FaceApp is the most popular selfie editing app and the top app with more than 750M+ downloads. It offers a fantastic set of highly photorealistic filters with “simple for you and complicated in the background” photo processing achieved via single taps. The app is available in 24 languages for free and as a subscription on iOS and Android devices.

A few facts about us:

  • TOP app at 154 countries for iOS and at 99 countries for Android (including USA, Great Britain, EU, Brazil, South East Asia);
  • App of the Year at AppStore and Google Play;
  • State-of-art technology photo editing.

We really appreciate our team and the relationships within it, and we hope that you, too, know how to build work in the key of a trusting and friendly atmosphere.

In addition to the photo direction, we are launching a video editing direction, and are looking for an experienced Senior Python Backend Developer to strengthen the team.

Responsibilities:

  • Development of API for an application with hundreds of millions of users;
  • Development of database architectures (PostgreSQL);
  • Design and development of high-load photo processing services;
  • Support for video processing service.

Our requirements:

  • Expert knowledge of Python 3;
  • Experience with relational databases (for example, PostgreSQL, MySQL);
  • Knowledge of basic network protocols.

Desirable (will be a plus):

  • Experience with cloud services AWS or Google Cloud, Tencent Cloud, Azure Cloud.
  • Development experience in Go;
  • Experience in the development of high-load services;
  • Experience in developing API for mobile applications;
  • Experience with Django, DRF;
  • Familiarity with Docker.

Why work at FaceApp?

  • Above market wages, formal employment and white wages;
  • Cozy office with sea view;
  • VHI with dentistry;
  • Compensation of costs for professional literature;
  • Sports compensation;
  • Compensation for the purchase of a mobile phone (once a year, 50% of the cost is compensated);
  • Free English lessons with a native speaker;
  • Flexible start of the working day from 09:00 to 11:00;
  • Possibility of relocation to Cyprus (Limassol);
  • Comfortable working conditions, a positive atmosphere, an open, informal corporate culture, and a friendly team.
  • An excellent opportunity, together with a professional team, to solve interesting and complex problems, to create a product that is used by millions of people.
